attributes.action: Allow shirt signing for leavers in all schools!
attributes.additional_details:
Do you have a momento from your last days at Primary and Secondary School?

Did you and your friend's sign each others school shirts when leaving Primary and Secondary School?

Most of you will answer this question with a big "YES" but our children are being stopped from undergoing tgis time old tradition of shirt signing on the last day of school.

Make sure your child can also answer with a big "YES" and doesn't regret not having there shirt signed as the school didn't allow it.

YES TO SHIRT SIGNING IN ALL SCHOOL'S!
